clone_object(string, mixed * args)

Public Functions

These are functions that everyone can access.

.
clone_object
object clone_object(string str,
mixed * args ...)
This method creates a new object. This is overridden to handle the virtual object stuff. See the documentation on the efun clone_object for more information.

Parameters:
str - the object to clone
Returns:
the newly cloned object
